## Problem Identification
The dataset we have contains all mortgage decisions made in 2015 for the state of New York. The final managerial objective is helping banks to decided their mortgage decisions based on customers' information. 

```{r}
homeMortgage <-read.csv(file.choose())
ls(homeMortgage)
unique(homeMortgage$action_taken_name)
unique(homeMortgage$action_taken)
```
